title: Riot broke my heart on purpose
body:
I was at work all day like "yay new champ select is gonna be so fun."
I get home and it's reverted and teambuilder is disabled as well.
I fucking hate regular champ select. Why you do this to me when my heart is already struggling, Rito?

Fuck you. 
https://45.media.tumblr.com/a4084286fc4cd1b0c367001631145675/tumblr_mxgp7xLpUK1t4ivp6o1_500.gif

1 like = 1 prayer.
